definition: border district/borderland
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/CL:個|个[ge4]/simultaneously
suffix of a noun of locality
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州 in Jilin province 吉林省 in northeast China, capital Yanji city 延吉市

sentences.english: In some birds, soft areas around the beak occur.
sentences.chinese: 在一些鳥類，嘴軟周邊地區發生的。

sentences.english: Southwesterly winds are the dominant meteorological parameter for this transport.
sentences.chinese: 風場是影響周邊地區污染輸送的主要氣象因素。

sentences.english: The area around the Sea is basically semi-desert.
sentences.chinese: 死海周邊地區實際上是半沙漠化的。

sentences.english: The resolution also bans the use of heavy weapons around the city of Abidjan.
sentences.chinese: 該決議還禁止在阿比讓周邊地區使用重武器。

sentences.english: Thus, our company has become one of the most ideal working environments in local areas.
sentences.chinese: 成爲周邊地區較爲理想的職工從業環境之一。

sentences.english: Mont Blanc and its surrounding area is known as Europe's best mountain scenic spot.
sentences.chinese: 勃朗峯及其周邊地區被號稱爲歐洲最佳山景區。

sentences.english: Radiates to Southeast Asia and the Chinese peripheral locality.
sentences.chinese: 輻射到東南亞及中國周邊地區。

sentences.english: We place nannies in Beijing, Shang Hai and surrounding areas.
sentences.chinese: 我們只在北京和上海及周邊地區安排保育員。

sentences.english: So the Pacific Rim has helped shape my view of the world.
sentences.chinese: 因此，太平洋周邊地區影響了我的世界觀的形成。

sentences.english: Pollution is also rising, which has affected the banks and surrounding areas.
sentences.chinese: 污染也不斷上升，影響湖岸和周邊地區。

sentences.english: The cultivation of flower for commercial purposes started in Haarlem and the surrounding area about 400 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 約400年前哈萊姆和周邊地區開始種植商用花卉。

sentences.english: Boden Lake is the main drinking water source of Stuttgart and other towns nearby.
sentences.chinese: 該湖是德國斯圖加特市及其周邊地區的主要飲用水源。

sentences.english: Dapo Town and its nearby areas become the largest production base of pepper.
sentences.chinese: 大坡鎮及相鄰的周邊地區是全國最大的胡椒生產基地。

sentences.english: Preserve Moon Bay and surrounding area.
sentences.chinese: 保護月亮灣及其周邊地區。

sentences.english: However, no such respite is in the offing for peninsular India and surrounding regions.
sentences.chinese: 印度半島和周邊地區看不到喘息機會。

sentences.english: Houses in and around commercial districts in the city centre were even more expensive.
sentences.chinese: 市中心商業區及周邊地區的住房價格則更爲昂貴。

definition: little mistake/minor offense/slightly too much
unheard of/an extremely rare and unprecedented event
in great abundance/numerous
misconception/fallacy
to overcorrect (idiom)/to overcompensate
Rudong county in Nantong 南通[Nan2 tong1], Jiangsu
make light of traveling a thousand li/go to the trouble of traveling a long distance
to throw one's life in for/to haplessly give one's life for/to sacrifice oneself torturously working for another or for a group/to pour in one's utmost effort/to shed one's last ounce of strength for
(of a deity) to take a material shape/to appear
in a great mess/chaotic
irreverent
appearance/view/abiding impression
to become enemies/to become hostile towards
alternative name/to refer to sth by another name/antonomasia
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
